name: Engine
description: The main game engine class that manages the game loop, timing, systems, and overall game execution.

properties.name: isRunning
properties.description: Indicates whether the game loop is currently running

properties.name: currentFPS
properties.description: The actual frames per second being achieved

properties.name: deltaTime
properties.description: Time elapsed since the last frame in milliseconds

properties.name: totalTime
properties.description: Total time elapsed since engine start in milliseconds

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts the game loop and begins running the game

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stops the game loop and pauses game execution

methods.name: setWorld
methods.description: Sets the World instance that manages entities and components

parameters.name: world
parameters.description: The World instance to use for entity management

methods.name: setRenderer
methods.description: Sets the renderer to use for drawing the game

methods.name: setInputManager
methods.description: Sets the input manager for handling keyboard, mouse, and gamepad input

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Registers a callback to be called every frame for game logic updates

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function called each frame with delta time in milliseconds

methods.name: onRender
methods.description: Registers a callback to be called every frame for rendering

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function called each frame to render the game

methods.name: getSystem
methods.description: Retrieves a system by its type
methods.signature: getSystem<T extends System>(systemType: Constructor<T>): T | null

parameters.name: systemType
parameters.description: The class/constructor of the system to retrieve

methods.returns: T | null - The system instance or null if not found

methods.name: addSystem
methods.description: Adds a system to the engine
